taskDescription:
Identify all the integers in the following list: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>−4</mtext>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>2</mn>
    <mn>7</mn>
  </mfrac>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mtext>15</mtext>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mtext>97.5</mtext>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mtext>0</mtext>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>122</mn>
  </msqrt>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{−4}, \frac{2}{7}, \text{15}, \text{97.5}, \text{0}, \sqrt{122}</annotation></semantics></math>.
